title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente.
Cook guanciale/bacon until crispy; remove from heat.
Whisk eggs with cheese and pepper.
Toss hot pasta with bacon fat, then mix in egg-cheese off heat.
Add crispy guanciale and more pepper; serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala

Grill or pan-sear chicken until charred.
Simmer tomato puree with butter and spices.

title: Avocado Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with avocado, tomato, onion, and a light lemon dressing.
instructions: Whisk olive oil, lemon, salt, and pepper.
Toss gently with dressing and serve.
